pages.text: Booflos are passive creatures that can be found in the Poise Forests of the End. They use their mouths to be able to fly over all the End.$(br2)Booflos can be tameable, first you need to feed one of this creatures with Bolloom Fruits, now you will have to stay away from it or it will attack you.$(br2)You will have to repeat this process a few times.
Like Wolfs collars, you can dye them applying Dyes right clicking of them while you are holding a Dye.

A tamed Booflo can be rided. Just right clic on it. Like a Horse, they can be move with AWSD keys, but in this case you will have to keep pushed the specific key, because they don't walk, they move by jumping..$(br2)You can fly with them using the Space key, you will have to keep pressing this key for a few seconds and then stop pressing it to fly.$(br2)Be careful with their stamina or they will get tired.
Here I will insert a picture of a rided Booflo.

Tamed Booflos can be breed giving them Poise Cluster.$(br2)On death these interesting creatures may drop Booflo Hide.$(br2)Booflo Hide can be used to craft a new block called Boof Block or a new armor called $(l:patchouli:armors/booflo_vest)Booflo Vest$(/l) too.$(br2)Booflos have 3 stages in their life: Baby Booflo, Adolescent Booflo and finally Adult Booflo.
